metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Git History
What is Git History? Why Use It?
Git keeps a detailed record of every change made to your project.
content.html: Git keeps a detailed record of every change made to your project.

content.text: You can use history commands to see what changed, when, and who made the change.
content.html: You can use history commands to see what changed, when, and who made the change.

content.text: This is useful for tracking progress, finding bugs, and understanding your project's evolution.
content.html: This is useful for tracking progress, finding bugs, and understanding your project's evolution.

content.text: Key Commands for Viewing History
Best Practices for Viewing History
See Commit History ( git log )
Show a detailed list of all commits in your repository:
content.html: Show a detailed list of all commits in your repository:

content.code:
git
log
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803 (HEAD -> master)
Author: w3schools-test
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

Updated index.html with a new line
content.code_html:
git log
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803 (HEAD -> master)
Author: w3schools-test 
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

    Updated index.html with a new line

content.text: This command shows all commits, including author, date, and message.
content.html: This command shows all commits, including author, date, and message.

content.text: Use the arrow keys to scroll, and press q to quit.
content.html: Use the arrow keys to scroll, and press q to quit.

content.text: Tip: While viewing the log, you can search for a word by typing / followed by your search term (for example, /fix ), then press n to jump to the next match.
content.html:
Tip: While viewing the log, you can search for a word by typing / followed by your search term
(for example, /fix), then press n to jump to the next match.

content.text: Press q at any time to quit.
content.html: Press q at any time to quit.

content.text: Show Commit Details ( git show < commit > )
See all the details and changes for a specific commit:
content.html: See all the details and changes for a specific commit:

content.code:
git
show 09f4acd
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803 (HEAD -> master)
Author: w3schools-test
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

Updated index.html with a new line

diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
+New Title
content.code_html:
git show 09f4acd
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803 (HEAD -> master)
Author: w3schools-test 
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

    Updated index.html with a new line

diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
+New Title

content.text: This command shows everything about a commit: who made it, when, the message, and the exact changes.
content.html: This command shows everything about a commit: who made it, when, the message, and the exact changes.

content.text: Compare Changes ( git diff )
See what is different between your working directory and the last commit (unstaged changes):
content.html: See what is different between your working directory and the last commit (unstaged changes):

content.code:
git

diff

diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title
content.code_html:
git diff
diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title

content.text: This command shows changes you have made but not yet staged for commit.
content.html: This command shows changes you have made but not yet staged for commit.

content.text: Compare Staged Changes ( git diff --staged )
See what is different between your staged files and the last commit:
content.html: See what is different between your staged files and the last commit:

content.code:
git

diff
--staged
diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title
content.code_html:
git diff --staged
diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title

content.text: This command shows changes that are staged and ready to be committed.
content.html: This command shows changes that are staged and ready to be committed.

content.text: Compare Two Commits ( git diff < commit 1 > < commit 2 > )
See what changed between any two commits:
content.html: See what changed between any two commits:

content.code:
git

diff

1234567
89abcde
diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title
content.code_html:
git diff 1234567 89abcde
diff --git a/index.html b/index.html
index 1234567..89abcde 100644
--- a/index.html
+++ b/index.html
@@ ...
-Old Title
+New Title

content.text: This command shows the differences between two specific commits.
content.html: This command shows the differences between two specific commits.

content.text: Show a Summary of Commits ( git log --oneline )
Show a short summary of each commit (great for a quick overview):
content.html: Show a short summary of each commit (great for a quick overview):

content.code:
git
log --oneline
09f4acd Updated index.html with a new line
8e7b2c1 Add about page
1a2b3c4 Initial commit
content.code_html:
git log --oneline
09f4acd Updated index.html with a new line
8e7b2c1 Add about page
1a2b3c4 Initial commit

content.text: This command shows each commit on a single line for easy reading.
content.html: This command shows each commit on a single line for easy reading.

content.text: Show Commits by Author ( git log --author = "Alice" )
See only the commits made by a specific author:
content.html: See only the commits made by a specific author:

content.code:
git
log --author
=
"Alice"

commit 1a2b3c4d5e6f7g8h9i0j
Author: Alice
Date:   Mon Mar 22 10:12:34 2021 +0100

Add about page
content.code_html:
git log --author="Alice"
commit 1a2b3c4d5e6f7g8h9i0j
Author: Alice 
Date:   Mon Mar 22 10:12:34 2021 +0100

    Add about page

content.text: This command filters the log to show only commits by the author you specify.
content.html: This command filters the log to show only commits by the author you specify.

content.text: Show Recent Commits ( git log --since = "2 weeks ago" )
See only commits made in the last two weeks:
content.html: See only commits made in the last two weeks:

content.code:
git
log --since
=
"2 weeks ago"

commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803
Author: w3schools-test
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

Updated index.html with a new line
content.code_html:
git log --since="2 weeks ago"
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803
Author: w3schools-test 
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

    Updated index.html with a new line

content.text: This command shows only the commits made in a recent time frame.
content.html: This command shows only the commits made in a recent time frame.

content.text: Show Files Changed Per Commit ( git log --stat )
See which files were changed in each commit and how many lines were added or removed:
content.html: See which files were changed in each commit and how many lines were added or removed:

content.code:
git
log --stat
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803
Author: w3schools-test
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

Updated index.html with a new line

index.html | 2 +-
1 file changed, 1 insertion(+), 1 deletion(-)
content.code_html:
git log --stat
commit 09f4acd3f8836b7f6fc44ad9e012f82faf861803
Author: w3schools-test 
Date:   Fri Mar 26 09:35:54 2021 +0100

    Updated index.html with a new line

index.html | 2 +-
1 file changed, 1 insertion(+), 1 deletion(-)

content.text: This command adds a summary of file changes to each commit in the log.
content.html: This command adds a summary of file changes to each commit in the log.

content.text: Show a Branch Graph ( git log --graph )
See a simple ASCII graph of your branch history (great for visualizing merges):
content.html: See a simple ASCII graph of your branch history (great for visualizing merges):

content.code:
git
log --graph --oneline
* 09f4acd Updated index.html with a new line
* 8e7b2c1 Add about page
|\
| * aabbccd Merge branch 'feature-x'
|/
content.code_html:
git log --graph --oneline
* 09f4acd Updated index.html with a new line
* 8e7b2c1 Add about page
|\
| * aabbccd Merge branch 'feature-x'
|/

content.text: This command shows a simple graph of your branch and merge history.
content.html: This command shows a simple graph of your branch and merge history.

content.text: Troubleshooting
Note: Exploring your history helps you understand what changed, when, and why.
content.html: Note: Exploring your history helps you understand what changed, when, and why.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
